meanings.definition: Covered with or full of elm trees.
meanings.sent1: The elmy forest was a peaceful place to explore.
meanings.sent2: The park had an elmy feel with its tall, leafy trees.
meanings.sent3: The elmy landscape provided a shady spot for a picnic.
meanings.sent4: Her hair cascaded down her back, elmy and graceful.
meanings.sent5: The elmy branches swayed gently in the breeze, creating a soothing rustling sound.

meanings.definition: Resembling an elm tree in appearance or characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The painting captured the elmy essence of nature.
meanings.sent2: The old house had an elmy charm with its wooden beams.
meanings.sent3: His elmy voice reminded her of the rustling leaves.
meanings.sent4: The fabric had an elmy texture, rough yet comforting.
meanings.sent5: The elmy scent of the candle brought back memories of the forest.
